title: Justin Bieber Wrote A Song With Ed Sheeran & Calls It His Favorite On 'Purpose'
text: Justin Bieber poses for some pictures after his interview at KISS FM studios on Friday (October 23) in London, England. The 21-year-old musician has been promoting his upcoming album, Purpose, and brand new song, “Sorry”, around the country. Speaking with Capital FM, Justin opened up about working with Ed Sheeran on a track. “We wrote [...] »
